item.title: ChannelAdam WCF Library
item.description: Documentation for a .NET code library that handles the subtleties of consuming services using Microsoft's Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) library - including correctly performing the Close/Abort pattern and preventing memory and server connection leaks.

item.description: Quickly start using the ChannelAdam WCF Library.

item.description: How to use the retry policy mechanism in the ChannelAdam WCF Library.
